title: PM Kisan Samman Nidhi
description: Direct income support of ₹6000 per year to farmer families paid in three equal installments of ₹2000 each, every four months.

title: Startup India Seed Fund
description: Financial assistance up to ₹5 crore to startups for proof of concept, prototype development, product trials, and market entry.

title: National Education Scholarship
description: Merit-based scholarships for students pursuing higher education in recognized institutions across India.
